name: Tuk Tuk Sri Lankan Riders
description:
Now you can Download it to your Mobile Phone and have Fun!
Let’s play Off Road Sri Lanka Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw rider simulator game with experience in taking and dropping passengers from one stop to another stop. The game is about to go out and taxi the people to their destination. Drive like public transport and provide best services to the passengers by dropping them on their destination within time limit.
